message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CV (Computer Vision) is the most likely category as the paper deals with evaluating image description generation systems based on the content of the actual image. 
2. cs.CL (Computation and Language) is also likely as the paper proposes a novel image-aware metric for evaluating the faithfulness of generated captions. 
3. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another possible category as the paper deals with evaluating the performance of AI systems in generating image descriptions. 
4. cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a possible category as the paper proposes a metric that takes into account the relative importance of objects mentioned in human reference descriptions during evaluation. 
5. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is a less likely category, but still possible as the paper proposes a metric for evaluating the similarity between labels of objects depicted in images and words in the description.
